programme.title: Los 7 Sellos De La Santa Muerte 2
programme.desc: After dismantling a powerful sect, the mysterious crimes continue and the police are dedicated to investigating who is the new leader of the organization to catch him and put an end to the violence.

programme.title: Brillando En La Oscuridad
programme.desc: Two men, one mourning the murder of his child and the other the aftermath of being cheated by his wife, travel to Jacomulco to find inner peace. On the road, they find several unique characters.

programme.title: Cuatro Esquinas
programme.desc: Juan Manaure, the only Venezuelan who has the chance to play one-on-one with Michael Jordan, started his career as a young humble boy in a slum debating himself between follow his dreams of basketball glory or falling dawn into the tempting abyss of a life in crime.

programme.title: Codigo Paz
programme.desc: Pedro Ruiz is a Dominican real estate broker by day and a savvy but out-of-luck thief by night. He dreams of a better life and easy money. Desperate to look for respect climbing the money ladder the easy way, he gets in the wrong mansion at the wrong time.

programme.title: Atrako Por Joder
programme.desc: A group of friends, tired of the routine, decide to become robbers, unleashing chaos in the city. In one of their jobs they catch a famous singer of dem bow music. They kidnap him and take him ou to party with them.

programme.title: Medeas
programme.desc: A daring and lyrical exploration of alienation and desperation through the intimate observation of a family's inner lives and their relationship to each other and their environment.

programme.title: Welcome To Tijuana
programme.desc: Based on a Corrido by Gerardo Ortiz and Jorge Santa Cruz, a band of violent criminals lead by La Bestia try to take over Tijuana under their bloodthirsty domain, but the people is ready to face them off.

programme.title: Te Presumo
programme.desc: A businessman who has the ideal life faces his fate when one day he returns from a motorcycle race in which his son won first place, and everything in his life turns upside down.

programme.title: Reto Sangriento
programme.desc: A ghost hunting TV show begins to run into trouble as TV ratings start to drop. The owner of the television station forces the team to look for fresh content with realism at the cost of anything.

programme.title: Devil's Witness
programme.desc: The Italian vacation of two college girls clashes with an ancient ritual. But sometimes the pray become hunters.

programme.title: Texas Huele A Sangre
programme.desc: A Texas sheriff wants to bring order to his county, but he is faced with a violent drug dealer who tries to enforce his law at all costs, unleashing an impressive wave of violence and blood.

programme.title: Sed De Venganza
programme.desc: When an undercover agent's cover is blown and he's murdered with no mercy, nobody thought that their two young and beautiful daughters are trained to kill.

programme.title: Pordioseros Y Ladrones
programme.desc: It seemed that Eduardo had it all, however, life turned its back on him after a betrayal that left him on the street. His godfather is a beggar who will confront the cartel that took absolutely everything from him.
